title: The time has come to redeem our pledge: Happy Independence Day
selftext: To bring freedom and opportunity to the common man, to the peasants and workers of India; to fight and end poverty and ignorance and disease; to build up a prosperous, democratic and progressive nation, and to create social, economic and political institutions which will ensure justice and fullness of life to every man and woman.
cleaned_text: time come redeem pledge happy independence day bring freedom opportunity common man peasants workers india fight end poverty ignorance disease build prosperous democratic progressive nation create social economic political institutions ensure justice fullness life every man woman
